Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>You!<sp:5:0:0> I need your help again!<sp:5:0:0> Please!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If you follow the coast <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff>, you'll
arrive at my hometown, <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>.
StartPoint_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>But I hear the village is in trouble.
It's been taken over by pirates.<sp:0:4:0>I've thought about going back and trying
to do something...<sp:5:0:0>but I don't know the
first thing about using a sword.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy_01>Now, using a fishing net's a different
story. Nobody can toss a net better
than me.
There's no better proof of that than the
fish I'm selling. All freshly caught!
BadWeather_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive>This weather can really bring you down...


<sp:3:0:2:0101>Fortunately, my freshly caught fish will
perk you right back up!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>Phew!<sp:5:0:0> Nice one.<sp:5:1:0> Guess I should've known
you'd pull it off.
StartPoint_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>But I hear the village is still recovering
from the recent pirate takeover.<sp:0:4:0>I've thought about going back and trying
to help out...<sp:5:0:0>but I don't know the first
thing about using a hammer.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy_01>Now, using a fishing net's a different
story. Nobody can toss a net better
than me.
There's no better proof of that than the
fish I'm selling. All freshly caught!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You took care of the monsters? How?<sp:5:0:0>
I mean, wow!
StartPoint_04:
Between the pirate attack and recovering
from the pirate attack, things were a
little rocky over there for a while.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>But thanks to some guy everyone's calling
"the savior of the village," the place is
happier and more peaceful than ever.
<snd:LaughS>Now I can catch and sell fish here in
Hateno with a clear conscience!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>You saved my life. <sp:5:0:0>You really are
something, you know that?
StartPoint_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>But I haven't been back in a while. I'm
too darn happy selling my wares here!
Com_Talk_05b:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I owe you one, so I'll give you a
good deal.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>That's a relief.<sp:5:0:0> Even the easy monsters
freak me out.
StartPoint_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>I hear it's been in a bad way ever since
the pirates attacked.<sp:0:4:0>But I found purpose here, so I haven't
been back.
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Anything you want to sell? Don't be shy!
ShopGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Take a look at the fish I caught. I'm so
proud of every last one of 'em!
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Wow, I'm all sold out! <sp:5:0:0>Guess I'd better
go catch more! <sp:5:0:0>Ha!
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, I'm completely sold out! <sp:5:0:0>You're
officially the customer of my dreams.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'll catch more fish. In the meantime,
would you like to take a look at my
inventory list?
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Heya!<sp:5:0:0> Seems like you do a lotta traveling.
You are makin' sure to stop by your
hometown now and then, right?
Guardian00: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>That is one scary monster. <sp:5:0:0>Be careful, pal!
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>What do you want to sell me?
Near_BackRange_02: This is the place for me.
Com_Talk_02: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thanks! Anything else you want to sell?
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Whoa!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


It's the guy who got me outta that cave!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks, guy!<sp:5:0:0> You're the reason I'm back
sellin' my wares in the open air.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>And guess what? I'm catchin' my own
now! No more sellin' secondhand fish
for me.
<snd:TalkPositive_00>This is my first catch of many. Soon,
people from all over will be eatin' my fish!
Com_Talk_02d: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I'd call that a fair trade. Thanks!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Here's a reward. <sp:5:0:0>Come on, don't be
modest. You earned it.
ShopGreet_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you like fish, you'll love mine! I've got
the finest around!

I also have <clr:0000>cheese <clr:ffff>from <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>
that's all the rage right now!
Com_Talk_07: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> Sorry, pal.<sp:5:0:0> I'm all out of that.
Com_Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:QuestionNormal>Um...<sp:5:0:0> You don't have enough rupees.<sp:5:0:0>
Sorry, but I can't go any lower.
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Looks like your pouch is full.<sp:5:0:0> Come back
when you've made some room.
Com_Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Take a nice, long look! <sp:5:0:0>You ever seen
prettier fish than these?
Com_Talk_13: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:ffff>How many do you want to sell?
Near_Rain: I'll fish after the rain stops.
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Ahhh...<sp:5:0:0> Sorry, pal.<sp:5:0:0> I can't buy that.
Greeting_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey!<sp:5:0:0> Look at ya, soaked to your bones
like a proper, rugged fisherman!<sp:0:4:0>But even the toughest fishermen return to
their home port. You are makin' sure to
visit your hometown now and then, right?
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>You're wearing that.<sp:5:0:0> Could you sell it to
me after you've taken it off?
Greeting_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey there!<sp:5:0:0> You takin' in the beautiful
sights of Hateno Village?
Greeting_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey!<sp:5:0:0> Look at ya, soaked to your bones
like a proper, rugged fisherman!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You owe it to yourself to buy my fish. Hey,
buy some for everyone in Hateno Village!
FriendGreet_02_00:
I've decided to do business in Hateno
Village up on the hill. All the Cece
excitement has the place bustling.
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Rain or shine, my fish are always fresh!<sp:5:0:0>
Smell for yourself!
FriendGreet_01_00:
I've decided to do business in Hateno
Village. With everyone going gaga over
Cece, the place is bustling.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Just when I finally get used to riding a
horse, I've gotta do this brutal climb
up to Hateno Village.
But imagining all the people there stuffing
their faces with my freshly caught fish
helps me push through the exhaustion!
Com_Talk_11_c:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Customers like you make my job
a pleasure!
